name: Tomato and Horseradish Sauce
recipeIngredient: 1 bay leaf (if fresh basil is not available)
2 ripe tomatoes, about 3/4 pound, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch cubes
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the olive oil in a small saucepan. Add the onions and garlic. Cook, stirring, until wilted, and then add the vinegar and bay leaf, if used. Cook until the vinegar is reduced to half.

Add the tomatoes, tomato paste, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring often, about 5 minutes. Add the basil, if bay leaf is not used, and the horseradish and swirl in the butter. Remove the bay leaf, if used, and serve.
